nodes.text: I thought of somthing sunday, as I was teaching sunday school (I know shocking),
You aren't serious are you??? Is this a joke? You're one of the most active attackers of Christianity in these threads. Aren't you the one that likes to use the term 'Christonazi?'
You mean he does not agree with your view of christianity.

I have a strong dislike of evangelical christianity, not christianity in general. A christonazi is someone who uses the christianity for political gains or someone who has a fanatical view of christianity. I am a member of an ELCA church, you know a liberal church with liberal and progressive views of christianity. I have even organized and run several VBS's.
But there are some evangelical Christian churches that don't do that. You don't seem to understand or recognize that evangelicalism is a very varied movement.
I don't think that Paul was actively gay. He was so odd about having anykind of sex at all that it was pretty warped.
Oh, what the hell. As is so often the case, I have a definitive source on this: http://www.lunaseas.net/gaps/episode9.html
